sentences.english: In medium saucepan over high heat, bring salted water to boil.
sentences.chinese: 取中號燉鍋配以高火，煮至鹽水沸騰。

sentences.english: For description, reviews, and find a rival slow cooker 6 most cost-effective.
sentences.chinese: 獲取描述，評論和找到對手慢燉鍋6最划算。

sentences.english: I've lost the lid of the saucepan .
sentences.chinese: 我把這個燉鍋的蓋子弄丟了。

sentences.english: Heat cream in a small saucepan over medium-high heat until just simmering.
sentences.chinese: 取一隻燉鍋中火加熱奶油，直到沸騰。

sentences.english: Bring the 3 cups water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 將3杯水加入一箇中等大小的燉鍋內，煮至沸騰。

sentences.english: As to dig out something I wrote for you and throw it into a stewpot.
sentences.chinese: 把我給你寫的信翻出來，放在燉鍋裏。

sentences.english: Saucepans in a range of sizes are essential.
sentences.chinese: 一整套兒各種大小的燉鍋必不可少。

sentences.english: Bring remaining 28 ounces stock to a boil in a medium saucepan over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 把剩下的28盎司乾菜加水在中號燉鍋中用高火煮沸。

sentences.english: The pot of stew on the stove seethed until it nearly boiled over.
sentences.chinese: 爐子上的燉鍋一直沸騰到將近煮幹爲止。

sentences.english: Add stock to pan and boil for 1 min. Add salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.chinese: 將雞湯倒入燉鍋中煮沸一分鐘，加入鹽和黑胡椒調味。

sentences.english: Simply remove the aluminum cookware insert and use it directly on your stove.
sentences.chinese: 只需取出慢燉鍋的鑄鋁內膽，將其直接放在爐火使用。

sentences.english: Electric cooker series products and other household appliances, one of the large enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 電燉鍋系列產品以及其它家用電器的大型企業之一。

sentences.english: It’s much easier to use slow cookers to keep some foods hot and let guests serve themselves.
sentences.chinese: 使用慢燉鍋來給食物保溫，讓客人自助食用會更方便。

definition: black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
